guides.title: Complete Study Permit Application Guide
guides.description: Step-by-step instructions for Indonesian students applying for a Canadian study permit. Includes document checklist, timeline, and common mistakes to avoid.

guides.title: Housing & Accommodation Guide for Students
guides.description: Comprehensive guide covering on-campus dorms, off-campus rentals, homestays, and tips for finding safe and affordable housing in major Canadian cities.

guides.title: Financial Planning for International Students
guides.description: Learn how to budget for tuition, living expenses, and emergency funds. Includes information about bank accounts, credit building, and money transfer options.

guides.title: Your First Week in Canada - Survival Guide
guides.description: Essential tasks and tips for your first week in Canada. From SIN applications to phone plans, this guide helps you settle in quickly and efficiently.

guides.title: Academic Success in Canadian Universities
guides.description: Navigate the Canadian education system with confidence. Learn about grading systems, academic integrity, professor interactions, and study strategies.

guides.title: Post-Graduation Work Permit (PGWP) Guide
guides.description: Everything you need to know about applying for PGWP, eligibility requirements, application process, and tips for a successful application.

guides.title: Surviving Your First Canadian Winter
guides.description: Comprehensive guide to preparing for harsh Canadian winters. Includes clothing essentials, winter driving tips, and maintaining mental health during cold months.

guides.title: Healthcare and Insurance Guide
guides.description: Understanding Canadian healthcare system, provincial health insurance, international student insurance options, and how to access medical care.

guides.title: Co-op and Internship Success Guide
guides.description: Maximize your co-op and internship opportunities. Learn about application processes, interview preparation, and making the most of work experience.

guides.title: Path to Permanent Residence in Canada
guides.description: Explore different immigration pathways for international students, including Express Entry, Provincial Nominee Programs, and Canadian Experience Class.

guides.title: Canadian Tax Filing Guide for Students
guides.description: Learn how to file your Canadian taxes as an international student. Includes information about tax benefits, deductions, and required documentation.

guides.title: Transportation Guide for Canadian Cities
guides.description: Navigate public transportation systems in major Canadian cities. Includes student discounts, transit apps, and tips for getting around efficiently.
